Header.Info: Performance Monitoring Events for Intel(R) Core(TM) Processor - V1.05

Events.BriefDescription: Read CAS command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: Read CAS command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: Write CAS command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: Write CAS command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: ACT command for a read request sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: ACT command for a read request sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: ACT command for a write request sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: ACT command for a write request sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: ACT command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: ACT command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM for a read/write request
Events.PublicDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM for a read/write request

Events.BriefDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM due to page table idle timer expiration
Events.PublicDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM due to page table idle timer expiration

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every read and write request entering the Memory Controller 0.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every read and write request entering the Memory Controller 0 (sum of all channels). All requests are counted as one, whether they are 32B or 64B Read/Write or partial/full line writes. Some write requests to the same address may merge to a single write command to DRAM. Therefore, the total request count may be higher than total DRAM BW.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every read and write request entering the Memory Controller 1.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every read and write request entering the Memory Controller 1 (sum of all channels). All requests are counted as one, whether they are 32B or 64B Read/Write or partial/full line writes. Some write requests to the same address may merge to a single write command to DRAM. Therefore, the total request count may be higher than total DRAM BW.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every CAS read command sent from the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels).
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every CAS read command sent from the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels). Each CAS commands can be for 32B or 64B of data.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every CAS read command sent from the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels).
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every CAS read command sent from the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels). Each CAS commands can be for 32B or 64B of data.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every CAS write command sent from the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels).
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every CAS write command sent from the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels).  Each CAS commands can be for 32B or 64B of data.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every CAS write command sent from the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels).
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every CAS write command sent from the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels).  Each CAS commands can be for 32B or 64B of data.

Events.BriefDescription: Total number of read and write byte transfers to/from DRAM, in 32B chunks. Counter increments by 1 after sending or receiving 32B chunk data.
Events.PublicDescription: Total number of read and write byte transfers to/from DRAM, in 32B chunks. Counter increments by 1 after sending or receiving 32B chunk data.

Events.BriefDescription: Number of bytes written to DRAM, in 32B chunks. Counter increments by 1 after sending 32B chunk data.
Events.PublicDescription: Number of bytes written to DRAM, in 32B chunks. Counter increments by 1 after sending 32B chunk data.

Events.BriefDescription: Number of bytes read from DRAM, in 32B chunks. Counter increments by 1 after receiving 32B chunk data.
Events.PublicDescription: Number of bytes read from DRAM, in 32B chunks. Counter increments by 1 after receiving 32B chunk data.

Events.BriefDescription: Total number of all outgoing entries allocated. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.
Events.PublicDescription: Total number of all outgoing entries allocated. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all CMI transactions
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all CMI transactions

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all CMI reads
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all CMI reads

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all CMI writes not including Mflush
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all CMI writes not including Mflush

Events.BriefDescription: Asserted on coherent DRD + DRdPref  allocations into the queue. Cacheable only
Events.PublicDescription: Asserted on coherent DRD + DRdPref  allocations into the queue. Cacheable only

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all entries allocated. Includes also retries.
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all entries allocated. Includes also retries.
